2025-02-09: Version 4.64 available

The Version 4.64 of QuickImageComment ist now available.

Changes:

New: Language file for French. Thanks to Régis for creating the translation. Note at this point: New languages can generally be added without program changes if a corresponding language file is created. Support for this is very welcome. Further information can be found at www.quickimagecomment.de.

The transmission of error reports and elementary anonymous usage data with the help of Microsoft AppCenter has been removed because AppCenter will be discontinued by Microsoft on March 31, 2025.

Download

Program 64-Bit - .Net 4.6.1 or higher
Program 32-Bit - .Net 4.6.1 or higher
